MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G84 postcode area of Helensburgh, affecting properties in Cove and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.43pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.45pm on Friday 05 February 2021.
